colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @041A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI SLOB BU PADMA RNAM RGYAL DANG THEG MCHOG BSTAN 'DZIN SOGS KYIS MAndAL DANG BCAS TE YANG YANG BSKUL NGOR, ^ CHOS DBYINGS STOBS LDAN RDO RJES RANG LO NYER DRUG GI STENG DBANG CHEN SPREL GYI LO KLU PHUG PADMA 'OD NAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO NYID DO, ,BLA MA DAM PA 'JIG MED RANG GROL DANG BLA MA RDO RJE GRO LONG GYIS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON DU PAR DU BSGRUBS SO, ,DGE'O, ,DGE'O, ,DGE'O,, ,,)
